plot outline: Olippooru is a short film with a blend of comedy with engaging drama and thriller genre which revolves around two local thieves when they met another group of thieves in the same house which they planned to loot.When 4 thieves from two different backgrounds met in one place,thier clash and arguments for the money is the main plot of the film.
title: Olipporu
plot: Olippooru is a short film with a blend of comedy with engaging drama and thriller genre which 4 thieves from two different backgrounds met in one place , thier clash and arguments for the money is the main plot of the film.

Olippooru is a short film with a blend of comedy with engaging drama and thriller genre which revolves around two local thieves when they met another group of thieves in the same house which they planned to loot.When 4 thieves from two different backgrounds met in one place,thier clash and arguments for the money is the main plot of the film.::Wedesigns
